sqlMap.statement:
SELECT REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,CTNM,CITP,CTID,CSNM,CTNT,HTDT,VALIDATE_IND FROM
T07_NBH_CTIF
T07_NBH_CTIF_UH
T07_NBH_CTIF
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$
VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
ORDER BY REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.CATI_SEQNO,A.CSNM,CTNM,A.CTID,A.CITP,A.CTNT,A.VALIDATE_IND,'1' AS CASETYPE, A.Pbc_Crt_Dt FROM T07_NBH_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY
B.CREATE_ORG IN ($org_ids$)
A.pbc_crt_dt >= #pbc_crt_dt_start_s#
A.pbc_crt_dt <= #pbc_crt_dt_end_s#
SELECT A.REPORTKEY, A.CTIF_SEQNO AS CATI_SEQNO,A.CSNM,A.CTNM,A.CTID,A.CITP,A.CTNT,A.VALIDATE_IND,'2' AS CASETYPE, A.Pbc_Crt_Dt FROM T07_NBS_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY
B.CREATE_ORG IN ($org_ids$)
A.pbc_crt_dt >= #pbc_crt_dt_start_s#
A.pbc_crt_dt <= #pbc_crt_dt_end_s#
SELECT REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,CSNM,CTNM,CTID,A.CITP,CTNT,CREATE_ORG,VALIDATE_IND,CASETYPE,Pbc_Crt_Dt FROM ( SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.CATI_SEQNO,A.CSNM,CTNM,A.CTID,A.CITP,A.CTNT,B.CREATE_ORG,A.VALIDATE_IND,'1' AS CASETYPE, A.Pbc_Crt_Dt FROM T07_NBH_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY UNION ALL SELECT A.REPORTKEY, A.CTIF_SEQNO AS CATI_SEQNO,A.CSNM,A.CTNM,A.CTID,A.CITP,A.CTNT,B.CREATE_ORG,A.VALIDATE_IND,'2' AS CASETYPE, A.Pbc_Crt_Dt FROM T07_NBS_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY ) A WHERE 1>0
A.CREATE_ORG IN ($org_ids$)
A.CTNM like #ctnm#
A.CITP = #citp#
A.CTID = #ctid#
A.CSNM = #csnm#
A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
A.pbc_crt_dt >= #pbc_crt_dt_start_s#
A.pbc_crt_dt <= #pbc_crt_dt_end_s#
ORDER BY A.VALIDATE_IND

statement.isEqual:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_NBH_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY
B.CREATE_ORG IN ($org_ids$)
A.pbc_crt_dt >= #pbc_crt_dt_start_s#
A.pbc_crt_dt <= #pbc_crt_dt_end_s#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_NBS_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY
B.CREATE_ORG IN ($org_ids$)
A.pbc_crt_dt >= #pbc_crt_dt_start_s#
A.pbc_crt_dt <= #pbc_crt_dt_end_s#
statement.isEmpty:
select COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.CATI_SEQNO,A.CSNM,CTNM,A.CTID,A.CITP,A.CTNT,B.CREATE_ORG,A.VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_NBH_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY UNION ALL SELECT A.REPORTKEY, A.CTIF_SEQNO AS CTIF_SEQNO,A.CSNM,A.CTNM,A.CTID,A.CITP,A.CTNT,B.CREATE_ORG,A.VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_NBS_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY ) A WHERE 1>0
A.CREATE_ORG IN ($org_ids$)

sqlMap.statement: SELECT T1.* FROM T07_NBH_CTIF T1 WHERE T1.REPORTKEY=#reportkey# AND T1.CATI_SEQNO=$cati_seqno$

UPDATE T07_NBH_CTIF SET VALIDATE_IND=#validate_ind#
CSNM=#csnm#
CTNM=#ctnm#
CITP=#citp#
CTID=#ctid#
CTNT=#ctnt#
WHERE REPORTKEY=#reportkey# AND CATI_SEQNO=$cati_seqno$

SELECT REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,CSNM,HTCR_SEQNO,CRCD,TTNM,VALIDATE_IND FROM
T07_NBH_HTCR
T07_NBH_HTCR_UH
T07_NBH_HTCR
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$
VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
ORDER BY REPORTKEY,CATI_SEQNO,HTCR_SEQNO
